OCR_info.question_text: $\square$ 안에 알맞은 수를 써넣으시오.  (1) $ \begin{array}{r}3 \mathrm{~L}  500 \mathrm{~mL} \\ + 4 \mathrm{~L}  400 \mathrm{~mL} \\ \hline \square L \square \mathrm{mL}\end{array} $ (2) $ \begin{array}{r}1 \mathrm{~L}  280 \mathrm{~mL} \\ + 5 \mathrm{~L}  400 \mathrm{~mL} \\ \hline \square L \square \mathrm{mL}\end{array} $ (3) $ \begin{array}{r}2 \mathrm{~L}  300 \mathrm{~mL} \\ + 6 \mathrm{~L}  400 \mathrm{~mL} \\ \hline \square L \square \mathrm{mL}\end{array} $ (4) $ \begin{array}{r}7 \mathrm{~L}  600 \mathrm{~mL} \\ - 5 \mathrm{~L}  400 \mathrm{~mL} \\ \hline \square L \square \mathrm{mL}\end{array} $ (5) $ \begin{array}{r}8 \mathrm{~L}  560 \mathrm{~mL} \\ - 4 \mathrm{~L}  220 \mathrm{~mL} \\ \hline \square L \square \mathrm{mL}\end{array} $ (6) $ \begin{array}{r}7 \mathrm{~L}  380 \mathrm{~mL} \\ - 2 \mathrm{~L}  160 \mathrm{~mL} \\ \hline \square L \square \mathrm{mL}\end{array} $
